page.title: 10RECREATION IN OUR TOWN
page.content: In our town near our school,there are alot of different things for us to do after school and during the holidays. There are two Brownie packs and a Guide company,Boys & Girls Brigade, Scouts and Cub Scouts;these are all in the evening after school. At the weekends some of us go to dancing classes. We have a big park where we can play cricket or football in the field.There are some courts for badminton and tennis,and also putting and bowling greens. There is a pond for fishing and a brook where we can play and explore.In the middle of the park there is an interesting old priory that is a local museum.
